website_summaries.verdict: Is it a sink, or is it a work of art? Good-looking and durable, this handmade sink has a lot going for it, although trying to get two that exactly match might be difficult.
cons: Does not come with either a mounting ring or a drain, so you’ll definitely be hitting the hardware store prior to installation
Sink is not flat on the bottom, which can make it more difficult to install level

customer_reviews.title: The sinks are very beautiful and looks great
customer_reviews.text: The sinks are very beautiful and looks great...cons, the sinks aren't flat at the the bottom, this makes it a little more difficult when installing them... Sodomite that you will need to purchase a beauty ring for the bottom...understand that these sinks don't secure down tight like a normal sink would...this isn't functional for kids and everyday normal use... Great for a 1/2 bath or a spa type setting but wouldn't recommend for normal everyday use... Take a look at the picture that I installed and you'll see how nice they look...hope this helps you...
customer_reviews.author: De Chaunte Wilson

customer_reviews.title: I Think It's An Absolutely Gorgeous Vessel Sink.  Everyone Who Sees It Agrees
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I looked for about a month before finding this lovely vessel sink. For us a vessel sink is a necessity for our for very small bathroom so it needed to be stunning and practical. This fits the bill perfectly. Pros: - Well made - Very attractive design and color - Over-packaged for safety during transportation Cons: - None that I could find. It's perfect. Overall: Beautiful and well made. If this is your style you just can't go wrong! This is being used in with the following faucet and drain plug. They compliment this sink very well.
customer_reviews.author: Stefan Urquelle

customer_reviews.title: I gave this 4 stars because this is a beautiful bowl.
customer_reviews.text: I gave this 4 stars because this is a beautiful bowl...I expected the outside to match the inside...it does not, it has a tan, gold textured exterior. It matched my granite so I went ahead and used it...the inside looks like the picture, they need a true picture of the bowl from the side so people can see there is a significant difference between the interior and exterior.
customer_reviews.author: Karenhi

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT purchase from Everyday Interiors!
customer_reviews.text: Hello, The seller is refusing to send a free shipping label. As you can see from these photos, the sink is unevenly painted. This gives it an unacceptable appearance. It also looks like rubbing with water, which of course people do with sinks, will worsen the poor paint job. It is also scratched in the center, and it appears that it would be very easy to cause more scratches to occur with any usage.
customer_reviews.author: MOLO

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous Color and Design
customer_reviews.text: I searched Home Depot and Lowes in an attempt to purchase a sink and was very disappointed in their selections. I found a few desirable styles on Amazon and decided upon the one I purchased. The photos do not do it justice as the coloring and patterns are exquisite in person. My neighbor who is the first to admit he does not like plumbing nor is he proficient in it said the sink was a breeze to install. You can separately purchase a mounting ring for the bottom, which I would highly recommend. The ring is evident in one of the photos.
customer_reviews.author: Miki Haas

customer_reviews.title: Great Value Buy!
customer_reviews.text: We just installed this over the weekend and I am VERY impressed by the quality of the sink, the packaging and the aesthetics. But most of all, the price can't be beat! We looked at similar sinks locally and they cost 5 times the price of this one and I am still wondering what's the big difference between this and the others! We installed this ourselves and used a strong adhesive gel (clear) to attach to the marble countertop we purchased. The sink is now sitting very firm over the countertop with no visible leaks or such. I hope this lasts long and is durable but for now I am one happy customer!
customer_reviews.author: SNRS

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars for Appearance Minus 4 Stars for Exploding
customer_reviews.text: Looked and worked great for almost four years until it abruptly decided to shatter with a loud crash and spew glass shards and slivers through the bathroom. Fortunately no one was in the room at the time. Nothing fell into it or onto it or otherwise disturbed it, the sink simply spontaneously shattered. Absolutely won't be replacing it with tempered glass.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis M Gustafson

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: It looks just like the picture except it's even more beautiful in person. It's a very substantial piece of glass and it arrived on time and very well packaged. The only (tiny) negative is that it does show water and soap spots much more than a standard white ceramic sink but the tradeoff is more than worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Gorgeous sinks
customer_reviews.text: Wow! The picture does not do these sinks justice. They are gorgeous with very fine lines of gold running through them. The outside color is a beautiful light golden tone. A very nice surprise, Would highly recommend them. I bought two for my master bathroom. I bought the bronze 14" single handle faucets to go with them. Very rich looking. If I had a different surrounding in the room I would have bought gold.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great price.
customer_reviews.text: These are absolutely beautiful and very well made. With that said, we ended up selling them to someone at a huge discount on Craigslist because the gold color didn't quite work for our bathroom (and we waited to long to install them and realize the color wouldn't work). Either way, these are a great product and a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: terrible quality control
customer_reviews.text: terrible quality control. Received previously returned units, chips, etc. Ordered 2 for a double vanity. Unable to get 2 units every similar in color or pattern.
customer_reviews.author: ADMIN

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This product certainly lived up to its product description and then some. I do want to note two things that will probably be of importance for your purchase. 1) This does NOT come with a mounting ring, 2) This does NOT come with a drain. The mounting ring is not required, I purchased one from ebay for $25...which ended up having to small of a diameter for a standard drain, so I ended up using silicone caulking. The caulking ended up working great and doesnt take away from the look and/or functionality.
customer_reviews.author: afreeland

customer_reviews.title: BETTER THAN ADVERTISED
customer_reviews.text: I was leery based the price but these sinks are gorgeous. As nice as sinks for three times the money. Vigo has several similar sinks and you can't go wrong with any of them. The color is true to what you see on the net.
customer_reviews.author: Stan Halpern

customer_reviews.title: Stunningly pretty, and easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love this sink. It is a great value. One of the bonuses of this type of design is MORE CABINET space inside the vanity. We installed it on a granite counter-top, This type of sink also reduces the cost of the granite, because there is much less cost in cutting the sink hole, and the edges of the hole in the granite do not need to be finished.
customer_reviews.author: AvidReader

customer_reviews.title: beautiful bowl, but difficult to match if you want a pair
customer_reviews.text: I love these bowls, but I ordered two at different times and the colors were too different. The manufacturer tried their best to match, but it was touch. Keep in mind these are handmade and you might not want to order if you need a pair.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth RH

customer_reviews.title: No Stars!Only
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. Bought the vessel sinks and figured at least the plumbing tubes or attachments would be included. Having a birthday party and I've spent countless hours at both Lowe's and Home Depot trying to get washer and attachments for the vessel bowls.
customer_reviews.author: B.M.

customer_reviews.title: Quality sink with beautiful colors and fantastic price!
customer_reviews.text: This vessel sink is gorgeous! The pictures do not do it justice because the colors are vibrant and go great with bronze fixtures. We installed this in our guest bathroom during a DIY remodel, added bronze bathroom fixtures, dark wood vanity and white toned granite counter top. Vessel sink matches perfectly! The price was amazing, too!!
customer_reviews.author: J. K.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to order because I like to see the product first hand. But this one is very attractive. We had found something like this at Ferguson and that one cost $500! This is close to what we had seen just a different color.
customer_reviews.author: tdiaz1978

customer_reviews.title: Half full not half empty!
customer_reviews.text: Nice product, it replace a clear glass bowl which was close to $500 for less than 20%. Same thickness (1/2), easy maintainable interior surface. Really nice if the bowl would come with a rubber gasket to rest on the existing steel stem. great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Classy and elegant!
customer_reviews.text: This bowl hides spots! It looks very expensive, strong and thick. It's bold and beautiful. Expect a dominating presence on your countertop, the color is strong and contrasting.
customer_reviews.author: A. J.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Beautiful....Love, Love, Love It!
customer_reviews.text: Originally purchased a Vigo vessel sink a couple years ago for a client that I renovated a master bathroom for. I knew they would love it and they were thrilled at the look. They have received many many compliments. Loved it so much, I bought one to go in powder room of my own home that I updated with a travertine stone top, new mirror and fixture. It is a solid, beautifully crafted piece of art.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie H.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful sink and is such a nice focal feature to our small powder bath. Cleans easily.
customer_reviews.author: lolli

customer_reviews.title: The craftsmanship is excellent and these were a great buy
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely gorgeous! I bought two and while they are not identical, the match is close enough for side by side sinks. The craftsmanship is excellent and these were a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful vessel!
customer_reviews.text: This is truly the prettiest vessel I have seen; unfortunately, i did return it because it didn't match my rustic theme. The color is as displayed.
customer_reviews.author: linda lou

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: This sink came quickly and wrapped in a nice bag. Easy to install with the Ikea plumbing that I had. I have 3 Vigo sinks and they are all beautiful. The sink does look like the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Saroka Household

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous1
customer_reviews.text: This sink is absolutely gorgeous and we constantly receive compliments on it. Guests will often come out of the bathroom and tell the other guests "You have got to see this sink"! Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Wisco mom

customer_reviews.title: Packaging and documentation were excellent.
customer_reviews.text: Anxious to put this into service. Packaging and documentation were excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Wilhelm

customer_reviews.title: great looking sink very glad I purchased it
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievable value, great looking sink very glad I purchased it! Works excellent with the "Kraus PU-10-MR-1ORB Pop Up Drain and Mounting..." drain.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Vessels
customer_reviews.text: They are PERFECT in our master bathroom. We replaced clear glass vessel sinks and they bring so much personality to the counter. I'm thrilled and what a great deal!
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary Harrington

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love this bowl!!! durable and easy to install. its a fantastic addition piece to my half bath.
customer_reviews.author: Redblaze18

customer_reviews.title: We are very happy with colors melded in the glass as well as ...
customer_reviews.text: The sink arrived in very well packed box from both Amazon & the manufacturer. Very high quality. We are very happy with colors melded in the glass as well as the exterior texture.
customer_reviews.author: joe-rktek

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: looks great! very thick glass. Can't imagine it getting broken unless you were hitting it with a hammer.
customer_reviews.author: elmo2274

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product!
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, excellent quality, well protected packaging. Looks very nice on our re-purposed wooden sideboard that is now our bath vanity.
customer_reviews.author: gp3

customer_reviews.title: Looks very high in in our bathroom for minimal cost ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks very high in in our bathroom for minimal cost. Very shiny, but not as dark as shown in the picture, there is lot of gold in it.
customer_reviews.author: RickyG

customer_reviews.title: This sink is so pretty -- bought two to go in my new bathroom
customer_reviews.text: This sink is so pretty -- bought two to go in my new bathroom. I found some granite that looked similar and the sinks look like they are part of the granite. So pretty!
customer_reviews.author: rltidwell

customer_reviews.title: Great choice
customer_reviews.text: This was a great choice for my remodeled bathroom. It's a great look when you get in, it's the focal point. Resistant to little taps and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Neil B

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: 5 star product. By the way, the outside is hand painted but looks gorgeous.
customer_reviews.author: S Parven

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a great product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this as it was the last one and I am sooo glad I did. I just love the new sink.. Fits perfect with my new bathroom vanity.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the bowl colors
customer_reviews.text: Love the bowl colors. There is a significant area around the drain hole where the finish is gone. We hope that when the faucet and pop-in drain arrive that it will cover this area. Rather than that really satisfied with this purchase for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Dee L.

customer_reviews.title: Would Recommend this Sink!
customer_reviews.text: Magnificent colors in this bathroom sink. I'm getting lots of compliments. Would recommend this sink. Glass is very thick also. I expect it to last for years.
customer_reviews.author: Carol A. Pelletier

customer_reviews.title: Misleading picture and description.
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed the underside of the bowl did not have the clear resin type finish to it. I feel there is more of an opportunity for the bowl to get damages because of this. When you look at the picture of the bowl it looks like it has the protective layer over the entire bowl but it does not.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Scott

customer_reviews.title: Elegant
customer_reviews.text: This vessel atop my black quatrtz vanity is amazing. And such a buy..
customer_reviews.author: anna knight

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: What a Great Sink, has a rich heavy luxurious feel to it.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel R Trotter

customer_reviews.title: So good I got a second one
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Once I got the one for the master bath, I liked it so much I got one for the guest bath.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Kuykendall

customer_reviews.title: Amber Sunset Vessel Sink is fabulous.
customer_reviews.text: I'm redoing my bathroom and this sink is so gorgeous with my new black marble vanity top.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Rheude

customer_reviews.title: Great buy and shopping experience!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful sink! The perfect compliment to my wet bar. We installed lights above that really showcase the colors. I had originally seen this sink on the website of a major home improvement retailer for more money and was told It was back ordered. Then I went on Amazon and found it for less money and received it within a week.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia A Deshong

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: We loved the color and the sink, just to big.
customer_reviews.author: susan r. novak

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: the sinks are stunning, couldn't have imagined them being this lovely.. AAA+++
customer_reviews.author: James Smith

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful! So happy I bought this
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful! So happy I bought this, having carefully read the reviews.
customer_reviews.author: noni 129

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful sinks, excellent quality! Sinks were packaged well and arrived in perfect condition. We purchased two and both sinks were true to the color in the pictures and match each other very well. They are unique and give our bathroom a very modern look.
customer_reviews.author: Chris S

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL vessel sink and priced WAY below what it sells ...
customer_reviews.text: BEAUTIFUL vessel sink and priced WAY below what it sells for in stores. Couldn't be happier with my purchase! Thanks so very much!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Trego

customer_reviews.title: awesome!! wasn't sure what it would look like
customer_reviews.text: awesome !! wasn't sure what it would look like , but when it arrived I was surprised how good it really was . way better than my old sink .. thanks !!
customer_reviews.author: Ron Deeths

customer_reviews.title: We haven't installed them yet but they are beautiful. The color is more vibrant than it appeared ...
customer_reviews.text: We haven't installed them yet but they are beautiful. The color is more vibrant than it appeared on the internet and the underside, while matted is still very pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Moore

customer_reviews.title: Nice Vessel Sink!
customer_reviews.text: This sink met my expectations. It is large, but not too large. Need to be careful with mounting the faucet, so that there is no dripping outside of the sink, when you turn off the faucet. A very nice contemporary look for anyone who is looking for that impact.
customer_reviews.author: LisafromCa

customer_reviews.title: Shine on
customer_reviews.text: Looks as good as online pictures, great price, and securely packaged. Easy and secure installation with pop up drain additional item ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Balduf

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely gorgeous! Very pleased with it. This vessel sink looks even prettier than the picture!
customer_reviews.author: WF

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit!
customer_reviews.text: Brought 2 and they fit nicely into my bathroom decor.
customer_reviews.author: Horace Ellison

customer_reviews.title: The sink is beautiful!! I just wish that it had an ...
customer_reviews.text: The sink is beautiful!! I just wish that it had an option that comes with the matching faucet and drain.
customer_reviews.author: Dez

customer_reviews.title: really pretty. I have yet to install it yet
customer_reviews.text: really pretty. I have yet to install it yet, but it has great colors and it was sent in perfect condition
customer_reviews.author: leslie

customer_reviews.title: Elegant
customer_reviews.text: Very beautiful and unique! Especially in the light. Well-made. Would definitely recommend this brand to and friends.
customer_reviews.author: holyhonda

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful coloring of glass
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful coloring of glass. fit and function are perfect in the bathroom where this was placed. Great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: great buy
customer_reviews.text: I looked for a couple of months found vessel bowels like this for $300-$400 got it on amazon for $100 def tell this is a quality product for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: raymond spears

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The vessel is beautiful and the color is awesome, we are very pleased with it!
customer_reviews.author: Ronda Jenko

customer_reviews.title: It was better than what I was excpecting
customer_reviews.text: It was better than what I was excpecting. The color is fabulous and I can't wait to see it installed.
customer_reviews.author: Gail

product_meta.title: VIGO Handmade Amber Sunset Golden Woodgrain 16" Diameter Round Tempered Glass Vessel Vanity Bathroom Sink. Sink Only. Above Counter Install. Non-Porous, Scratch/Stain Resistant Surface
feature_bullets: HANDMADE VESSEL BOWL SINK: Handcrafted bathroom vessel sink in resilient tempered glass, designed in a distinctive round bowl style beloved by professional designers and architects alike.
TIMELESS ELEGANCE: Features a polished smooth interior and a delightful textured exterior. The bowl sink is finished in glistening amber hues in a woodgrain pattern for a modern yet timeless look.

UNIQUE FIXTURE: Single bowl sink is HAND PAINTED, giving each a unique finish and brings a WORK OF ART to your bathroom. Provides an eye-catching touch and it is an instant conversation piece and sure to become the focal point of a bathroom upgrade.

EASY TO INSTALL: Above counter round vessel sink creates modern luxury in a contemporary bathroom. The countertop installation creates extra square footage for storage in space-conscious bathrooms. Sure to wow you and your guests every time it’s used!

PREMIUM TEMPERED GLASS: Glass bathroom sink is constructed from SOLID TEMPERED GLASS for safety and durability. Our VIGO bathroom sinks exceed durability standards for a sink that will not crack, chip, or scratch.

BUILT TO LAST: This small beautiful fixture is built to last through years of daily use as the centerpiece of any bathroom remodel. Vessel bowls are easy to clean and will not stain from toothpaste, cleaning products or cosmetics.
DIMENSIONS: 16 1/2" D x 6" H x 1/2" thick. Standard 1 3/4" drain opening

QUALITY WE STAND BY: A limited Lifetime Warranty on your Amber Sunset glass vessel bath sink means you can feel confident in the quality of your new bathroom fixture. This basin sink is ADA compliant.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars107 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
